Apple_leaf_00005.jpg.text: The leaf is green in color with a smooth texture. It has a heart-shaped base and is slightly wavy. The edges of the leaf are smooth, and there are no visible damages or spots on it. The petiole is thin and green, and it appears to be attached to the leaf securely.

Apple_leaf_00004.jpg.text: The leaf is green in color with a smooth texture. It has a heart-shaped base and serrated edges. The veins are visible, running from the base to the tip of the leaf. The petiole appears to be thin and green.
